getMaxSwap(address,address,address).details: Gets the maximum input for a valid swap pair

params._input: Asset to input only bAssets accepted
params._output: Either a bAsset or the mIx

getMaxSwap(address,address,address).return: validvalidity reasonmax input units (in native decimals)how much output this input would produce (in native decimals, after any fee)

getRedeemValidity(address,uint256,addres.details: Determines if a given Redemption is valid

params._mIx: Address of the given mIx (e.g. mUSD)
params._mIxQuantity: Amount of mIx to redeem (in mUSD units)

getRedeemValidity(address,uint256,addres.return: validvalidity reasonoutput in bAsset unitsbAssetQuantityArg - required input argument to the 'redeem' call

getSaveBalance(address,address).details: Gets the users savings balance in Mix terms

getSaveRedeemInput(address,uint256).details: Returns the 'credit' units required to withdraw a certain amount of Mix from the SAVE contract

params._mIxUnits: Amount of mIx to redeem from SAVE

getSaveRedeemInput(address,uint256).return: input for the redeem function (ie. credit units to redeem)

suggestMintAsset(address).details: Returns a valid bAsset with which to mint
suggestMintAsset(address).return: valid boolstring messageaddress of bAsset to mint

suggestRedeemIx(address).details: Returns a valid bAsset to redeem
suggestRedeemIx(address).return: valid boolstring messageaddress of bAsset to redeem
